channel.title: How to fix this?
channel.description:
Okay whenver someone logs in and out of my server more than once it says this in my cmd
Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Test1. (Me) java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0<Native Method> at java.net.SocketInputStream.read<Unknown Source> at java.net.SocketInputStream.read<Unknown Source> at client.packetProcess<client.java:19588> at PlayerHandler.process<PlayerHandler.java:304> at process.run<process.java:24> at java.lang.Thread.run<Unknown Source>
And then everyone on my server disconnects. Please help :|

item.title: How to fix this?
item.dc:creator: @Torax1 Toraxâ„¢
item.description:
@Torax1 wrote:

Okay whenver someone logs in and out of my server more than once it says this in my cmd

Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Test1. (Me)
java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed
at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0
at java.net.SocketInputStream.read
at java.net.SocketInputStream.read
at client.packetProcessclient.java:19588
at PlayerHandler.processPlayerHandler.java:304
at process.runprocess.java:24
at java.lang.Thread.run

And then everyone on my server disconnects. Please help

Read full topic
